mapper.select: select count(*) from postLikeTbl where uid = #{uid} and postId = #{postId}
mapper.delete: delete from postLikeTbl where postId = #{postId} and uid = #{uid}
mapper.update: UPDATE postTbl SET postTbl.likeCount = (SELECT count(postId) FROM postLikeTbl WHERE postId = #{postId}) WHERE postTbl.postId = #{postId};
